# Copilot Instructions

Guidance for GitHub Copilot in this repository.

## Required Reading

**Read these files before starting work:**
- `../AI-WORKFLOW.md` - Workflow and issue tracking (mandatory)
- `../AI-README.md` - Project conventions

## Copilot Specific

- Copilot does not run repository slash commands; follow the `.issues/` workflow manually.
- Always create/update `issue.md`, `plan.md`, `summary-N.md`, and `summary.md` as required.
- Update `../.issues/index.md` when creating or completing issues.
